// src/ChurnInsights.js import React from 'react'; import './ChurnInsights.css'; const ChurnInsights = () => { return (

Customer Churn Insights and Recommendations

Get valuable insights into customer churn trends and actionable recommendations to improve customer retention.

Insights Overview

Key Insights

  • High Churn Rates: Customers with lower account balances and fewer transactions are more likely to churn.
  • Retention Factors: High engagement with online banking and mobile apps correlates with lower churn rates.
  • Service Quality: Customers who report poor service quality or have unresolved complaints are more likely to leave.

Churn Trends Over Time

{/* Replace with actual chart */}

Recommendations

Based on the insights, here are some tailored recommendations to reduce churn:

  • Increase Customer Engagement: Offer targeted promotions and incentives to customers with lower engagement.
  • Enhance Online Services: Improve the user experience for online and mobile banking to boost customer satisfaction.
  • Address Complaints Quickly: Implement faster resolution processes for customer complaints and feedback.

Provide Feedback

); } export default ChurnInsights;
